text:
Are there plans from HubSpot to allow for DND email templates to be uploaded to the Asset Marketplace?

I know users have been locked from adding new templates, in favor of Themes, but curious if anyone knows the short/medium term solution for DND emails?
Anyone else  having people buy themes but they are not appearing in their account after purchase?
Hey Brandon, are you just looking for a solution to create DND email templates?

No, actually, more interested in the APIs that are associated with transferring them from portal to portal.

We have an app that essentially transfers any asset from one portal to another.

But for now, we are limited with being able to transfer DND emails. So have to use a workaround, which is still using DM files and templates.
Thatâ€™s what I meant. Saving your DND emails as templates in the Design Manager. You could then transfer them between portals.
